content: I don't have personal opinions or beliefs, but i can give you some insights. even if you don't personally care about sustainability and infrastructure, it is important to consider the long-term impacts of your vacation destination. unsustainable development and poorly maintained infrastructure can result in overcrowding, pollution, and environmental degradation, leading to a degraded experience for all tourists, including you. additionally, if the government can't provide necessary infrastructure it may lead to safety concerns or logistical issues during your trip, hampering your ability to enjoy your vacation. by supporting responsible tourism and advocating for sustainable development and infrastructure, you can help ensure the long-term success and enjoyment of your destination, benefitting both locals and tourists alike.
